CustomField.description: For pre-session assignments, the number of days before the session to generate assessments. For post-session assignments the number of days after the session has passed. Set to 0 to create assessments on the day of the session.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For pre-session assignments, the number of days before the session to generate assessments. For post-session assignments the number of days after the session has passed. Set to 0 to create assessments on the day of the session.
CustomField.label: Days Offset
